question.a1: The thing holding your OS together, sometimes a bit panicky.
question.a2: The parent class of Base-Object, as of Ruby 1.9.
question.a3: A module mixed into Object. The hierarchy is Base-Object > Kernel > Object, in order of inheritance.
question.a4: A module mixed into Object. The hierarchy is Base-Object > Object > Kernel, in order of inheritance.
